title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
**Discover the Perfect Workspace with Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash!**

Elevate your home or office with the sleek and functional Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk. Crafted from medium-density fiberboard with a stunning Blonde Ash finish, this desk is designed to meet both your professional and personal needs, providing a versatile and stylish workspace that will enhance any setting.

**Key Features:**

- **Dimensions:** 59 inches in width, providing ample space for all your essentials.
- **Material & Finish:** Durable medium-density fiberboard paired with a paper laminate finish for a professional look.
- **Scratch-Resistant & Water-Spill Resistant:** Ensuring your desk remains looking pristine, even with daily use.
- **4 Drawers for Organized Storage:**
  - 1 Slide-out keyboard tray for easy access to your equipment.
  - 1 File drawer for important documents.
  - 3 Box drawers for larger items or supplies.
- **Recommended Use:** Ideal for both home and professional environments, perfect for managers, professionals, and home office enthusiasts.
- **ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards Certified:** Ensuring the highest level of quality and durability.
- **Assembly Required:** While it may require more than one person to handle due to its weight and size, our in-home assembly service is available to help you install your desk seamlessly. Contact us at 866-388-4350 for assistance.

**Why Choose the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk?**

- **Stylish and Functional:** The Blonde Ash finish adds a touch of elegance to any room, while the thoughtful design ensures you have everything you need at your fingertips.
- **Durable Construction:** Built to withstand the demands of daily use and the toughest office environments.
- **Easy Organization:** With multiple drawers and a slide-out keyboard tray, keeping your workspace organized has never been easier.
- **Professional Quality:** ANSI/BIFMA certified, ensuring the highest standards of performance and safety.

Transform your workspace today with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk. Order now and experience a more productive and comfortable work environment. For any questions or assistance, contact our customer service team at 866-388-4350.
